johto_pokedex.name: Chikorita
johto_pokedex.description: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to sunbathe.

johto_pokedex.name: Bayleef
johto_pokedex.description: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.

johto_pokedex.name: Meganium
johto_pokedex.description: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.

johto_pokedex.name: Cyndaquil
johto_pokedex.description: It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball. If startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.

johto_pokedex.name: Quilava
johto_pokedex.description: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching foes.

johto_pokedex.name: Typhlosion
johto_pokedex.description: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.

johto_pokedex.name: Totodile
johto_pokedex.description: It has the habit of biting anything with its developed jaws. Even its Trainer must be careful.

johto_pokedex.name: Croconaw
johto_pokedex.description: Once its jaws clamp down on its foe, it will absolutely not let go until the foe is torn.

johto_pokedex.name: Feraligatr
johto_pokedex.description: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.

johto_pokedex.name: Sentret
johto_pokedex.description: It stands on its tail to get a better view of its surroundings. If it spots an enemy, it screams.

johto_pokedex.name: Furret
johto_pokedex.description: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.

johto_pokedex.name: Hoothoot
johto_pokedex.description: It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head.

johto_pokedex.name: Noctowl
johto_pokedex.description: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness.

johto_pokedex.name: Ledyba
johto_pokedex.description: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted from its feet indicates its location.

johto_pokedex.name: Ledian
johto_pokedex.description: In star-filled skies, it flies around scattering a glowing powder. The powder brings good luck.

johto_pokedex.name: Spinarak
johto_pokedex.description: It spins a web using fine but durable thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.

johto_pokedex.name: Ariados
johto_pokedex.description: It attaches thread to its prey and releases them. Later, it tracks the prey by the scent of the thread.

johto_pokedex.name: Crobat
johto_pokedex.description: The transformation of its legs into wings made it better at flying, but more clumsy at walking.

johto_pokedex.name: Chinchou
johto_pokedex.description: It discharges positive and negative electricity from its two antennae. It flashes its lights to communicate with others.

johto_pokedex.name: Lanturn
johto_pokedex.description: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.

johto_pokedex.name: Pichu
johto_pokedex.description: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Pikachu with high Happiness.

johto_pokedex.name: Cleffa
johto_pokedex.description: Because of its unusual star shape, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Clefairy with high Happiness.

johto_pokedex.name: Igglybuff
johto_pokedex.description: Its soft and pliable body is very bouncy. When it sings continuously, its body turns a deep shade of pink.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Jigglypuff with high Happiness.

johto_pokedex.name: Togepi
johto_pokedex.description: It is said that its shell is filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Togetic with high Happiness.

johto_pokedex.name: Togetic
johto_pokedex.description: It is said to appear in front of kindly people to scatter a glowing down called 'joy dust'.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Togekiss with a Shiny Stone.

johto_pokedex.name: Natu
johto_pokedex.description: It can't fly because its wings are not yet fully grown. It hops along instead.

johto_pokedex.name: Xatu
johto_pokedex.description: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun's movement all day.

johto_pokedex.name: Mareep
johto_pokedex.description: Its fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static charge. The more static it builds, the brighter the lightbulb on its tail glows.

johto_pokedex.name: Flaaffy
johto_pokedex.description: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide protects it from the electricity.

johto_pokedex.name: Ampharos
johto_pokedex.description: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the light from this Pokémon's tail.

johto_pokedex.name: Bellossom
johto_pokedex.description: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.

johto_pokedex.name: Marill
johto_pokedex.description: The tip of its tail is filled with oil that is lighter than water, so it acts as a float.

johto_pokedex.name: Azumarill
johto_pokedex.description: It can make balloons out of air. It makes these air balloons if it spots a drowning Pokémon.

johto_pokedex.name: Sudowoodo
johto_pokedex.description: It stands along paths pretending to be a tree. It is said to hate water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.

johto_pokedex.name: Politoed
johto_pokedex.description: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.

johto_pokedex.name: Hoppip
johto_pokedex.description: It drifts on the wind. It is said that when Hoppip gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.

johto_pokedex.name: Skiploom
johto_pokedex.description: It blooms when the temperature rises over 64 degrees Fahrenheit. The flower's scent is calming.

johto_pokedex.name: Jumpluff
johto_pokedex.description: Even in a hurricane, it can control its fluff to keep from being blown away.

johto_pokedex.name: Aipom
johto_pokedex.description: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Ambipom after learning Double Hit.

johto_pokedex.name: Sunkern
johto_pokedex.description: It suddenly appeared one morning after a cold night. It moves as little as possible to store nutrients for evolution.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Sunflora with a Sun Stone.

johto_pokedex.name: Sunflora
johto_pokedex.description: It converts solar energy to nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm.

johto_pokedex.name: Yanma
johto_pokedex.description: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Yanmega after learning Ancient Power.

johto_pokedex.name: Wooper
johto_pokedex.description: It lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

johto_pokedex.name: Quagsire
johto_pokedex.description: This carefree Pokémon has an easy-going nature. It doesn't care if it bumps its head on boats or boulders.

johto_pokedex.name: Espeon
johto_pokedex.description: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its enemy's actions.

johto_pokedex.name: Umbreon
johto_pokedex.description: When agitated, this Pokémon protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.

johto_pokedex.name: Murkrow
johto_pokedex.description: It is said that when it is seen at night, it will bring bad luck. It loves anything that glitters.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Honchkrow with a Dusk Stone.

johto_pokedex.name: Slowking
johto_pokedex.description: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's brain and unlocked an extraordinary power.

johto_pokedex.name: Misdreavus
johto_pokedex.description: It loves to bite and yank people's hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions.
johto_pokedex.evolution: Evolves into Mismagius with a Dusk Stone.

johto_pokedex.name: Unown
johto_pokedex.description: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

johto_pokedex.name: Wobbuffet
johto_pokedex.description: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the dark. It is never first to attack.
